title: Bruce Willis Supports Ex-Wife Demi Moore at Book Launch Party
text:
Demi Moore's book launch party was a family affair and Bruce Willis was right there by his ex's side showing support for her tell-all.

The actress' family and famous friends came out to celebrate the launch of her memoir, "Inside Out," on Monday evening, hours before the book became available for purchase.

Related:

Bruce Willis Is Totally The Cool Dad, Hangs With Daughters Rumer, Tallulah and Scout

Bruce Willis Bounced the Ball to the Plate at the Phillies Game

Bruce Willis Renews Vows With Wife on 10-Year Anniversary

Bruce Willis & Demi Moore Reunite for Daughter's 30th Birthday

Bruce Willis Ends Daughter Date Night With Classic Fart Joke

View photos

Willis and Moore posed right next to each other alongside their daughters,Rumer, 31, Scout, 28, and Tallulah, 25.

Also, pictured in the family photo is Willis' wife of 10 years, Emma Heming.

It's interesting that the actor is supporting his ex-wife's tell-all considering she divulges some pretty heavy things about their former marriage.

View photos

In her book, she reveals that once she started having babies, Willis wasn't happy with how she balanced her career and family.

According to The Times, he thought her acting career took away from family time.

Moore also states that Willis is the one who wasn't happy in their marriage and reportedly told her he wasn’t sure if he wanted to be married.

View photos
description: Bruce Willis was there to support his ex Demi Moore during her tell-all book launch party.
